mapper.select: select id, cron, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, class_name, start_time, stop_time, last_run_time from test.t_cron_trigger where id = #{id}
select id, cron, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, class_name, start_time, stop_time, last_run_time from test.t_cron_trigger limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into test.t_cron_trigger(cron, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, class_name, start_time, stop_time, last_run_time) values (#{cron}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{className}, #{startTime}, #{stopTime}, #{lastRunTime})
mapper.update:
update test.t_cron_trigger
cron = #{cron},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
class_name = #{className},
start_time = #{startTime},
stop_time = #{stopTime},
last_run_time = #{lastRunTime},
where id = #{id}
